==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology 1===
The Classical Chinese word for "chopsticks".  It has been replaced by {{zh-l|筷子}} in most dialects for taboo reasons, avoiding homophony with {{zh-l|住|stopping}} in boatmen's language. Still used in Min, and dialectal Mandarin/Wu/Cantonese/Hakka.

====Pronunciation====
{{zh-pron
|m=zhù
|c=zyu6
|md=dê̤ṳ
|mn=tī/tū
|mn-t=de7
|w=3zr
|mc=2
|oc=1,2
|cat=n,cls
}}

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|literary|regional}} [[chopsticks]] {{zh-mw|雙|md:奇|mn:跤}}
#* {{zh-x|紂王 有{ū} 一 日 得著 一 雙 象牙 ê 箸，伊 ê 人{jîn-}臣 箕{Kî}.子{Chú} 看-了 不止 憂悶 驚{kiaⁿ-}惶{hiâⁿ}。|One day, [[w:King Zhou of Shang|King Zhou]] got a pair of ivory '''chopsticks'''. His official {{w|Jizi}} saw that and became incessantly worried and frightened.|MN|ref='''1916:''' anon., [http://210.240.194.97/nmtl/dadwt/thak.asp?id=345 {{lang|zh|Tùi小可會知大項}}]}}
# {{lb|zh|Min}} chopstick-shaped [[object]]
#: {{zh-x|冰箸|ice lolly|tr=bĭng-{d}ê̤ṳ|MD}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese|Min|dialectal Mandarin}} {{n-g|Classifier for an amount of food held with a pair of chopsticks.}}
#: {{zh-x|我 夾 箸{zyu6} 麵 畀 你 試 下{haa5} 吖。|I'll get a '''"chopstick-ful"''' of noodles for you to try.|C}}
